ventana_ayuda.sh1: How to change the language of the application?
ventana_ayuda.ch1: To change the language of the application you must touch the button
ventana_ayuda.sh2: How can I see the options of the application?
ventana_ayuda.ch2: To see the available options of the application you must touch the button
ventana_ayuda.ch3: The available options are: Revived by his word and Spirit of prophecy
